BEBaseFoundation.stf_meta_keywords: event venues, event planning, events in Australia, MICE in Australia, business in Australia, conventions, congresses, association events in Australia, news, itineraries, convention centres, medical congreses, case studies
BEBaseFoundation.stf_meta_description: Find information about holding your association event in Australia. Itineraries, case studies, images and other helpful tools for association executives.
BEBaseFoundation.stf_PageTitle: Australia - Meetings, Incentives and Conferences – Official Website

BEGenericHeaderAndConentBody.txt_HTML:
Associations-only session at AIME
31 January 2012
A one-off education session exclusively for Australian association managers and leaders is being held for the first time in Melbourne next month.

Australia launches unique delegate boosting tools for associations
October 2011
Australia is launching a new toolkit to help associations secure the success of their major congresses through increased delegate numbers.

Strong Australian presence at IMEX as business events sector continues to grow 
25 May 2011 
The large Australian presence at IMEX reflects the upturn in business for Australia’s corporate and association meetings and incentives sector, as well as the increased investment in new infrastructure.

Australia adds to association offering 
24 May 2011
Australia has moved up five places to 11th position in the ICCA rankings of the world’s most popular destinations for international association meetings, and is offering more for associations bringing their meetings to Australia in 2011 and beyond.
